historical:
Prior Codifications

2001 Ed., § 33-101.06.

1981 Ed., § 41-151.6.

Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on § 106 of the Uniform Partnership Act (1997 Act). See Vol. 6, Part I , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 29-601.06

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Except as otherwise provided in subsection (b) of this section or § 29- 611.01(a), the law of the jurisdiction in which a partnership has its principal office shall govern relations among the partners and between the partners and the partnership.

The law of District of Columbia shall govern relations among the partners and between the partners and the partnership and the liability of partners for an obligation of a limited liability partnership.
